summary: A group of teenagers named "Imperceptible avengers" fight on the side of red army during the civil war in Russia.
cast: Viktor Kosykh|Mikhail Metyolkin|Vasiliy Vasilev|Valentina Kurdyukova|Lev Sverdlin|Yefim Kopelyan|Vladimir Treshchalov|Boris Sichkin|Inna Churikova|Nadezhda Fedosova|Gleb Strizhenov|Saveliy Kramarov|Lev Barashkov|Vladimir Belokurov|Anatoliy Nikitin
keywords: russian civil war|civil war|russia|fictional variety show|street performer
title: Neulovimye mstiteli
